      • publish

        public void publish(java.lang.String user_id,
                    java.lang.String consumer_id,
                    java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String message)
             throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                    java.io.IOException
        publishes a message.
        Parameters:
        user_id - id of the user that wants to publish
        consumer_id - id of the user that will be able to consume
        type - type of message (location, advertisement, etc)
        message - message to publish
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - problem when encoding the message.
        java.io.IOException - communication problem with the broker.
